post.author: 김유나
post.content:
회사정보
회사명 CPUSOFT Corporation Inc.

주소 Canada Ontario  
  Toronto North

홈페이지  

회사소개 Placement Agency


채용정보
직종 전산직  

직무 Software developer (ETL Programmer)

고용형태 Permanent, Full Time  

모집기간  Start Date: 2003/02/01

급여 To be negotiated

근무지 Canada   Ontario Toronto North  


지원자격
학력 Completion of university  

자격증 Computer Science degree or Technology and database training

경력 3 - 5 years

필요한기술 Strong UNIX skills including UNIX command set, SQL skills, korn shell scripting,perl, awk, sed an asset, vi , emacs.Ability to think in terms of parallel processing. Experience in a data warehousing environment a definite asset at minimum an understanding & appreciation for the principles and problems specific to a data warehouse, Understanding of the data architecture and concepts of relational dbs.

기타 Operating Systems: Environment - Client/Server, MS Windows 95/98/NT/2000, Unix
Hardware Environment: IBM PC and compatibles
Programming Languages: C, C++
Management Systems (erp or db): Data Warehouse, MS SQL Server
Other: Data modelling, Object-Oriented design, Structured design



지원방법
지원방법 By Fax/By E-mail  

담당자  

전화 -- -- -  

팩스번호 514- 696- 2137  

이메일 debra-lynn@cpusoft.com
